com.tollparkingapi.tollparking.service

Interface ParkingSlotService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParkingSlotServiceImpl

    public interface ParkingSlotService
    Parking Slot Service
    Author:
    Jeremy.ARFI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ParkingSlot> getAllAvailableParkingSlots()
      Allows to get a list of all the available ParkingSlot
      java.util.List<ParkingSlot> getAllAvailableParkingSlotsForGivenCarType(EngineType carType)
      Allows to get a list of all the available ParkingSlot for the given car type : If the car type is STANDARD then the parking slots available would be STANDARD If the car type is ELECTRIC_20KW then the parking slots available would be STANDARD and ELECTRIC_20KW If the car type is ELECTRIC_50KW then the parking slots available would be STANDARD and ELECTRIC_50KW
      ParkingSlot getParkingSlotFromParkedCar(java.lang.String carId)
      Allows to get the specific ParkingSlot for the given car identifier
      void resetParkingSlot(java.lang.Long parkingSlotId)
      Allows to reset the ParkingSlot to the initial values for the given parking slot identifier

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAvailableParkingSlots

        java.util.List<ParkingSlot> getAllAvailableParkingSlots()
        Allows to get a list of all the available ParkingSlot
        Returns:
        a list of all available ParkingSlot

      • getAllAvailableParkingSlotsForGivenCarType

        java.util.List<ParkingSlot> getAllAvailableParkingSlotsForGivenCarType(EngineType carType)
        Allows to get a list of all the available ParkingSlot for the given car type :
        • If the car type is STANDARD then the parking slots available would be STANDARD
        • If the car type is ELECTRIC_20KW then the parking slots available would be STANDARD and ELECTRIC_20KW
        • If the car type is ELECTRIC_50KW then the parking slots available would be STANDARD and ELECTRIC_50KW
        Parameters:
        carType - the car EngineType
        Returns:
        a list of all the available ParkingSlot for the given car type

      • getParkingSlotFromParkedCar

        ParkingSlot getParkingSlotFromParkedCar(java.lang.String carId)
                                 throws CarNotFoundException
        Allows to get the specific ParkingSlot for the given car identifier
        Parameters:
        carId - the car identifier
        Returns:
        the specific ParkingSlot for the given car identifier
        Throws:
        CarNotFoundException - if there is no car found

      • resetParkingSlot

        void resetParkingSlot(java.lang.Long parkingSlotId)
               throws NoParkingSlotAvailableException
        Allows to reset the ParkingSlot to the initial values for the given parking slot identifier
        Parameters:
        parkingSlotId - the parking slot identifier
        Throws:
        NoParkingSlotAvailableException - if the parking slot is not available
